title: Lunar Revel Art Contest Results - Sponsored by Wacom

replies.body: That 3rd prize is so cheap in comparison to the other two that i just feel bad for JATTIX he did such a good job with the {{champion:3}} art smh

Congratulations to everyone ^o^
So proud of all the entrants, and what a wild ride :3

My entry was the Jade Foo-Dog Gnar. Come say hello and check it out on my twitter [](https://twitter.com/_Artzie)

GIVE THE LANTERN YOU DID IT

I TOLD YOU

GO GIRL

{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
{{sticker:sg-poppy}}  I feel that this is appropriate
ur usernames tho, just kiss already
congrats!! :D
Congrats to all the winners and honourable mentions! All the art looks absolutely incredible. I would love to get any of those new skin designs!
Shameful secret: I had to check that we hadn't actually released a Warring Kingdom Galio skin, it was so perfect. D:

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=KoAIyqAc,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-03-02T04:21:52.870+0000)
>
> Shameful secret: I had to check that we hadn't actually released a Warring Kingdom Galio skin, it was so perfect. D:

Thanks, that's a very encouraging compliment! Will add more stuff next time :D
honestly that Galio was just spot on! absolutely amazing work!

Your AuSol is so cool *_*

(I just fixed it up, sorry about that - Boards can do some wacky things sometimes D: )

Damn... well deserved win on first place haha I dont even play Aurelion sol but that concept makes me want to.
Congrats to all the winners and everyone who entered! Can't wait for the next one {{sticker:sg-kiko}}
like how the 2nd one looks like overwatch's new hero even tho overwatch took it the art design from leona
My personal favourite was the lunar revel lulu. That dragon hat is too cute (> w<)

congrats to all the winners, hehe 

they're all so beautiful, especially the aurelion, galio and nami!
Awesome work everyone!!! So cool to see all of these epic new skins. Looking forward to next years competition!

Congrats to everyone! :)
